titles.title: Low Income Housing Preservation Act of 1988
A bill to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to make grants to States for the preservation of low income housing.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Housing and Community Development.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 9/7/1988--Introduced. Low Income Housing Preservation Act of 1988 - Authorizes the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to make grants to States to purchase and maintain eligible low-income housing. Authorizes FY 1989 through 1991 appropriations.
